name: iPhone 15
shortDescription: The iPhone 15 brings powerful performance, stunning visuals, and enhanced camera features.
longDescription: The iPhone 15 combines the power of the A16 Bionic chip, 5G connectivity, and a beautiful 6.1-inch OLED display, making it the perfect smartphone for any user. With advanced camera capabilities and a sleek design, it offers improved battery life and performance, giving you everything you need in a phone. Whether you're capturing high-quality photos or enjoying your favorite content, the iPhone 15 delivers in every aspect.
materialDescription: Glass front and back, aluminum frame

name: iPhone 15 Plus
shortDescription: The iPhone 15 Plus offers a larger screen and a more immersive experience with the same advanced features.
longDescription: The iPhone 15 Plus features a larger 6.7-inch OLED display and delivers the same power, performance, and camera improvements as the iPhone 15. It provides a more immersive viewing experience, enhanced battery life, and excellent photo and video capabilities, making it ideal for those who want a bigger screen without compromising on performance.
materialDescription: Glass front and back, aluminum frame

name: iPhone 15 Pro
shortDescription: iPhone 15 Pro delivers unparalleled performance, with a powerful A17 chip and exceptional camera features.
longDescription: The iPhone 15 Pro takes your smartphone experience to the next level with the new A17 Bionic chip, stunning 5G performance, and a gorgeous 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display. With a titanium frame and a powerful 48MP Pro camera system, this model is designed for the most demanding users, offering amazing speed, versatility, and durability. Whether you're a photographer, gamer, or multitasker, the iPhone 15 Pro is the perfect tool for both work and play.
materialDescription: Titanium frame with glass front and back

name: iPhone 15 Pro Max
shortDescription: The iPhone 15 Pro Max offers the best performance, including a larger 6.7-inch display and the most advanced camera system.
longDescription: The iPhone 15 Pro Max is the ultimate iPhone experience, with a larger 6.7-inch display, A17 Bionic chip, and the most advanced camera system Apple has ever made. This phone offers incredible performance for power users, whether you're editing photos, playing games, or streaming content. The Pro Max also boasts exceptional battery life and a robust design, featuring a titanium frame and a Super Retina XDR display.
materialDescription: Titanium frame with glass front and back

name: Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra
shortDescription: The Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra offers an advanced camera system, powerful performance, and a 6.8-inch dynamic AMOLED display.
longDescription: The Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra is designed for those who want the best in performance, photography, and display. Equipped with a 200MP camera, 5G capabilities, and a massive 6.8-inch dynamic AMOLED display, this phone delivers unmatched speed, visual quality, and usability. Whether you're creating content, gaming, or multitasking, the S23 Ultra can handle it all with ease.
materialDescription: Glass front and back, metal frame

name: Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra
shortDescription: The Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra features a cutting-edge 200MP camera, Snapdragon 8 Gen 3, and a 6.8-inch AMOLED display.
longDescription: The Galaxy S24 Ultra is packed with the latest technology, featuring a 200MP camera, Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 processor, and a stunning 6.8-inch AMOLED display. This flagship device offers top-tier performance for gaming, photography, and media consumption, all wrapped in a sleek, premium design. With an enhanced battery and faster 5G speeds, the S24 Ultra is built for those who demand the best from their devices.
materialDescription: Glass front and back, metal frame
